commentText: ONG I feel you. My new manager doesn't know what she's doing and is just causing more trouble for the rest of the staff. SMH
bruhh when jobs require the 5 year experience after graduating university.. its UNREAL.
no shot... thats messed up.. you literally got hired based on their job description the first time...
??? they gave up? they should just give up their position at that point
fr if i had to work off the clock, i would just clock back in for overtime. if they threaten to fire me for it, I will complain to department of labor.
that really sucks.. i hope that you are able to find a different job or move to a different city to relieve that stress.
I love it when companies dont care about your health and just give you any tasks believing that you can complete them while doing 40 other tasks they gave you... literally soooo dumb
fr fr if only companies cared
